summary: The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo, frontend-file-summaries.txt, frontend/index.html, and project_state.json. The critical requirement REQ-1 (adding a <meta name='dfinity-canister-id'> tag to frontend/index.html) is NOT implemented â€” the index.html shown in the diff contains no such meta tag. REQ-2 (updating backend canister ID in actor configuration/declarations) and REQ-3 (auditing/fixing dfx.json canister IDs and network targets) are also not implemented, as no changes to dfx.json, canister declarations, or useActor.ts are present in the diff. All three requirements remain in 'pending' status per project_state.json. The only substantive code change is to backend/main.mo, which is unrelated to the deployment configuration fix requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the correct canister ID is embedded in frontend/index.html meta tag so the ICP0.io gateway can resolve the frontend canister.
missing_requirements.reason: The modified frontend/index.html contains no <meta name='dfinity-canister-id'> tag. The head section only has charset, favicon, viewport, description, and title tags. The acceptance criterion is explicitly not met.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the backend canister ID referenced in the frontend actor configuration (useActor.ts and any generated declarations) matches the deployed backend canister ID.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to useActor.ts, generated canister declarations, or any canister ID binding files are present in the diff. The project_state.json still marks AR-2 as pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit dfx.json and canister configuration to confirm frontend and backend canister IDs are consistently defined and that deployment targets the correct network (ic mainnet).
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to dfx.json or any network/canister configuration files are present in the diff. The project_state.json still marks AR-3 as pending.

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to backend/main.mo including business logic changes such as user profile management, subscription handling, Stripe configuration with a hardcoded secret key, product IDs, and access control logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Do not modify backend business logic' and 'this is a deployment configuration fix only'. Changes to backend/main.mo are outside scope and not requested by any REQ.
